queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[2].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[4].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[2].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[4].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].apiGroups should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].apiGroups uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller-bootstrap}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].resources should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].resources uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[0].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[1].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules[0].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=fleet-controller-bootstrap.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=fleet-controller-bootstrap.rules.resources contains a wildcard value
files.actual_value: metadata.name=fleet-controller-bootstrap.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=fleet-controller-bootstrap.rules.resources contains a wildcard value

queries.description: Roles or ClusterRoles with RBAC permissions 'bind' or 'escalate' allow subjects to create new bindings with other roles. This is dangerous, as users with these privileges can bind to roles that may exceed their own privileges

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules[4].verbs should not include the 'bind' and/or 'escalate' permission

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.readinessProbe should be defined
metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["*"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{gitjob}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["*"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["*"]]

queries.description: A Service Account token is shared between workloads

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads
'spec.template.spec.serviceAccountName' should not be shared with other workloads

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=fleet-controller has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=gitjob has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cleanup has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=fleet-controller should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=gitjob should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=cleanup should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{fleet-controller}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{gitjob}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{gitjob}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cleanup}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{cleanup}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{fleet-controller}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{fleet-controller}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.containers.name=gitjob.securityContext should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=gitjob has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=gitjob does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{fleet-cleanup-clusterregistrations}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{cleanup}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem is true
metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{gitjob}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true

queries.description: Service should Target a Pod

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.ports.port={{80}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{gitjob}}.spec.ports.port={{80}} does not have a Pod port
